text: Nicole Vaidišová was the defending champion, but did not compete this year. First-seeded Marion Bartoli won the title by defeating Aiko Nakamura 2–6, 6–2, 6–2 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== * Main and Qualifying Draws Category:2006 Japan Open Tennis Championships
title: 2006 AIG Japan Open Tennis Championships – Women's Singles
